actions.text: Amendment SA 424 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 98.

Amendment SA 424 proposed by Senator Clinton. (consideration:  CR S4362-4363; text:  CR S4362-4363) To restore funding for vocational education to the fiscal year 2003 level for fiscal years 2004 through 2013.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 424 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 98.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 424 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 98.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 424 proposed by Senator Clinton.

purpose: To restore funding for vocational education to the fiscal year 2003 level for fiscal years 2004 through 2013.
